ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Song Help
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The location of all spells/songs is on http://eq.crgaming.com/ under the spells link. You will find all the luclin bard spells in Katta Castellum...the loc
ygData.messageBody:
--- Derek Pickens <emperornapo@...> wrote:
> Hi everyone! I've been playing Everquest for a couple weeks now and
> I love it! I don't know why I didn't get it earlier. Anyway, i am a
> level 10 bard and i am having some trouble finding a particular
> song. I need magical monolouge. It's not in Kelethin or in Shar
> Vhal. Could anyone help me find it? If you are in the Tunare server
> and you wanna help my name is Napo. Thanks alot!

The location of all spells/songs is on http://eq.crgaming.com/ under the
spells link.

You will find all the luclin bard spells in Katta Castellum...the loc is: 640
-330 and the name of the vendor is "Sellar Mulletune"

It's the lamest of all songs, though, completely useless to you. The ONLY
thing it does is let a non-magical weapon hit monsters which can only be hit
by magic weapons. Since even decaying skeletons drop magic weapons, by 9th
level you certainly should already have one...and what's more, almost nothing
you fight at 9th will be invulnerable to non-magic weapons yet.

--

--
Words of the Sentient:

The greatest horrors of life are not due to the ambition of the Napoleons
or the vengeance of the Agamemmnons, but to the doctrinaire philosophers...
The cold-blooded calcuations of Karl Marx led to the judicial and
business-like operations of the Checka. -- Aleister Crowley

=====
The people are difficult to keep in order
because those above them interfere.
-- Lao Tzu, /I Ching/
